survey_name: Urban Bike Sharing Program Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of urban bike-sharing programs to understand satisfaction levels, identify pain points, and improve service offerings.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use the urban bike-sharing program?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure options cover all possible usage frequencies.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use the urban bike-sharing program?

questions.question_text: What is your primary reason for using the bike-sharing program?
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections if applicable. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes) with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What is your primary reason for using the bike-sharing program?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of bikes at your preferred stations?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction levels. Ensure the scale is balanced and easy to understand.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of bikes at your preferred stations?

questions.question_text: Have you experienced any technical issues with the bike-sharing app or kiosks?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice question to identify common technical issues. Follow up with an open-ended question if 'Yes' is selected.

script.question_text: Have you experienced any technical issues with the bike-sharing app or kiosks?

questions.question_text: Please describe the technical issues you encountered (if any).
questions.routing_logic: Appears only if Q4 is answered with 'Yes, frequently' or 'Yes, occasionally'.
questions.client_notes: Use an open-text field to capture detailed feedback. Encourage respondents to be specific.

script.question_text: Please describe the technical issues you encountered (if any).
script.routing_logic: Appears only if Q4 is answered with 'Yes, frequently' or 'Yes, occasionally'.

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend the bike-sharing program to others?
questions.client_notes: Use a standard NPS (Net Promoter Score) scale. Ensure the question is clear and concise.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend the bike-sharing program to others?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the bike-sharing program?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-text field to gather qualitative feedback. Encourage detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the bike-sharing program?
